messages.title: A penny for education
messages.content: Radical plans announced by the Scottish Liberal Democrats will mean a Â£500 million extra investment for Scottish education.

messages.title: My plan for our area
messages.content: Empower nurses, doctors, teachers and social workers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in education with radical plans to support schools and colleges.
Plans to recruit GPs to tackle the shortfall and more support for mental health services.
Lib Dems will fight for stronger environmental protection and action on climate change.
Guarantee civil liberties by opposing the SNP's illiberal policies.

issues.education: Investment for Scottish education; reduce class sizes; exams overhaul; Pupil Premium; reverse college cuts; free childcare for 40% of two year olds.
issues.environment: Stronger environmental protection; action on climate change.
issues.governance: Opposing the SNP's illiberal policies on police state ID database.
issues.health: Recruit GPs to tackle shortfall; more support for mental health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Margot's experience and local knowledge make her the best candidate for Cathcart.

politicalExperience.achievements: Margot and the local Liberal Democrats worked to stop the closure of the Victoria Infirmary A&E, keep Langside Library open, and to get roads and pavements resurfaced and new lighting.
Experience as a teacher providing insight into the educational system.

endorsements.endorsement: One of the best performers at Holyrood.

quotes.text: The best again in Scottish education in a generation
